summary: This document appears to be a fragment of internal administrative or medical correspondence regarding an inmate's medication supply at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It references a prescription filled on July 12, 2019, and contains a standard sensitive information disclaimer from the U.S. Public Health Service.
